amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities Of The Second Class And Villages
amendatorysection.catchline: Joint city and school district facility; building commission; accept gifts.
amendatorysection.para: The building commission shall have the power to accept gifts, devises, and bequests of real and personal property to carry out the purposes of sections 17-156 to 17-162 and, to the extent of the powers conferred upon the building commission by sections 17-156 to 17-162, to execute and carry out such conditions as may be annexed to any such gifts, devises, or bequests.
